thread.title: It’s time to watch SNL’s genius take on Logo’s new ‘Fire Island’ reality show
thread.title_full: It’s time to watch SNL’s genius take on Logo’s new ‘Fire Island’ reality show

author: Dan Tracer
title: It’s time to watch SNL’s genius take on Logo’s new ‘Fire Island’ reality show
text:
If you watched the trailer for Logo’s upcoming reality show Fire Island and thought “That’s great and all, but couldn’t they have squeezed in a few more stereotypes?”, well you’re in luck. 
Saturday night’s Saturday Night Live brought life to Cherry Grove , a Fire Island spinoff that follows the wild lives of affluent lesbians. 
Related: The Twitterverse wasted no time in ripping Logo’s “Fire Island” to pieces 
The skit was a true highlight of the broadcast, and deserves a watch and maybe then a re-watch. 
So, take the hint and hit play:
